Description: EXCEPTIONAL NEAR MINT CONDITION, GREAT PLAYER! RARE LIMITED EDITION CUSTOM SHOP!!! This is an EPIPHONE SG G-400 1966 REISSUE ELECTRIC GUITAR . Made in 2008. 100% Original and Complete. This guitar is truly show room clean. This is as nice as a used guitar gets. Looks like it has rarely been played. First class guitar, not stamped 'used' or '2nd' like so many here on ebay. It comes with the original genuine EPIPHONE hard shell case you see in the pictures. It is a TKL case that was made in Canada by Boblin (the best on the market). Features include... chrome hardware, Grover tuners, 22 fret neck with rosewood fingerboard and pearly markers, two humbucker pickups, three way PU selector switch, tun-o-matic bridge, stop tailpiece, mahogany body, three ply pick guard. Professionally set up. Everything works as it should... electronics, truss rod, bridge, tuners, etc. I have serviced the guitar... cleaned and polished the neck and body, cleaned and conditioned the fingerboard, cleaned and polished the frets, 9-42 strings, adjusted bridge/truss rod/ intonation, etc. She is ready to play and PLAYS GREAT!! Buyer pays $39.95 shipping, insurance, packaging and handling to contiguous 48 states. Items over 2 lbs will ship Fed Ex ground, (no PO Boxes). Thanks for looking and good luck. Please take a look at my other listings and the last picture I have a great collection of inexpensive, but professional grade guitars listed for sale... a Mexican MIM made in Mexico Fender Stratocaster strat in Oly Olympic white with maple neck, a Korean NEAR MINT EPIPHONE LES PAUL STANDARD FLAME TOP TRANS CHERRY LIMITED EDITION electric guitar with gig bag case, a made in Korea Epi Korina Flying V 1958 reissue, a near mint SG G-400 LIMITED EDITION CUSTOM SHOP 1966 REISSUE with original hard shell case, a NEAR MINT EPIPHONE LES PAUL STANDARD in Cardinal Red and an exceptional transparent cherry red Ibanez AS73 TCR-12-01 semi hollow es 335 style electric guitar.
